Source.Name: perl-goocanvas2
Source.Summary: GooCanvas2 - Perl binding for GooCanvas2 widget using Glib::Object::Introspection
Source.Description: GooCanvas2 is a new canvas widget for use with Gtk3 that uses the Cairo 2d library for drawing. This is a simple and basic implementation of this wonderful Canvas widget.

Package.Name: perl-goocanvas2
Package.Summary: GooCanvas2 - Perl binding for GooCanvas2 widget using Glib::Object::Introspection
Package.Description: GooCanvas2 is a new canvas widget for use with Gtk3 that uses the Cairo 2d library for drawing. This is a simple and basic implementation of this wonderful Canvas widget.
